name: Endless Falling Simulator (Nate Bit Games)
description:
Yes, this is yet another version of the endless falling simulator for Cartridge Jam 3! Did not have time for a more intensive submission as I just released my first solo developed    game (Probe) on steam/itch/gamejolt mid-jam.  But hope you enjoy!

Use the Arrow Keys to flail your character in that direction.      Bounce off the walls if you want! Increases your score!

Avoid Hazards.   Some will kill you. 

Stay in the play area to avoid death.

The further you fall the harder and faster it gets!   The   more damage you take before dying the higher your score! How high of a score can you get!

NOTE:  All sound effects and music from various public domain or licensed purchased libraries

#madewithfusion   #Iwanttocreate
